description:
Hi,

i have been yesterday trying to launch an windows 2008,windows 2003 instance first the instance have been launched and i assigned the ip for the instance, but i couldn't take the instance Remote so i restarted all the services in nova. 

After that i can take the instance remote but not 2008 so i deleted the instance but i couldn't it showed the instance terminated but the task was in active state and status is deleting it haven't deleted yet till now.  i couldn't even launch any instance.

the nova-compute is in xxx state. others are in this state ( :-) ) i have restarted the service the nova-compute alone is showing un Known instance.

i checked the nova-compute.log file 

error details :

2012-12-13 12:53:20 DEBUG nova.utils [req-d855656f-e036-473f-8bf4-b01e8691da34 None None] Running cmd (subprocess): sudo nova-rootwrap route -n from (pid=3424) execute /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:219
2012-12-13 12:53:20 DEBUG nova.utils [req-d855656f-e036-473f-8bf4-b01e8691da34 None None] Running cmd (subprocess): sudo nova-rootwrap ip addr show dev eth1 scope global from (pid=3424) execute /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:219
2012-12-13 12:53:20 INFO nova.compute.manager [req-d855656f-e036-473f-8bf4-b01e8691da34 None None] [instance: 3715e4b5-692a-4d68-b1db-f18b08b2286f] Rebooting instance after nova-compute restart.
2012-12-13 12:53:21 CRITICAL nova [-] Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-0000000e'
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-compute", line 49, in <module>
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py", line 413, in wait
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     _launcher.wait()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py", line 131, in wait
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 166, in wait
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     return self._exit_event.wait()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/eventlet/event.py", line 116, in wait
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     return hubs.get_hub().switch()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/eventlet/hubs/hub.py", line 177, in switch
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     return self.greenlet.switch()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 192, in main
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     result = function(*args, **kwargs)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py", line 101, in run_server
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     server.start()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/service.py", line 162, in start
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     self.manager.init_host()
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 269, in init_host
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     block_device_info)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/exception.py", line 114, in wrapped
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     return f(*args, **kw)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py", line 852, in resume_state_on_host_boot
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     block_device_info=block_device_info)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py", line 790, in _hard_reboot
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     virt_dom = self._conn.lookupByName(instance['name'])
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/libvirt.py", line 2370, in lookupByName
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     if ret is None:raise libvirtError('virDomainLookupByName() failed', conn=self)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova libvirtError: Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'instance-0000000e'
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova




And in the lib virt .log file :

Errors detail:

2012-12-12 11:04:27.401+0000: 5792: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-12 11:04:42.208+0000: 5792: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-12 12:37:32.936+0000: 5792: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 04:50:51.320+0000: 323: info : libvirt version: 0.9.8
2012-12-13 04:50:51.320+0000: 323: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 05:07:37.338+0000: 323: error : qemuMonitorIO:603 : internal error End of file from monitor
2012-12-13 05:07:37.415+0000: 323: error : virNetDevGetIndex:656 : Unable to get index for interface vnet3: No such device
2012-12-13 05:07:38.866+0000: 323: error : qemuMonitorIO:603 : internal error End of file from monitor
2012-12-13 05:07:38.868+0000: 323: error : virNetDevGetIndex:656 : Unable to get index for interface vnet2: No such device
2012-12-13 05:08:02.408+0000: 331: error : virNetDevGetIndex:656 : Unable to get index for interface vnet5: No such device
2012-12-13 05:08:03.776+0000: 332: error : virNetDevGetIndex:656 : Unable to get index for interface vnet1: No such device
2012-12-13 05:23:30.046+0000: 1864: info : libvirt version: 0.9.8
2012-12-13 05:23:30.046+0000: 1864: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 05:26:38.557+0000: 1583: info : libvirt version: 0.9.8
2012-12-13 05:26:38.557+0000: 1583: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 06:51:38.320+0000: 1315: info : libvirt version: 0.9.8
2012-12-13 06:51:38.320+0000: 1315: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 06:57:32.949+0000: 1318: error : qemuSetupDiskPathAllow:82 : Unable to allow access for disk path /var/lib/nova/instances/instance-0000000e/disk.local: No such file or directory
2012-12-13 06:57:33.131+0000: 1318: error : virSecurityDACRestoreSecurityFileLabel:143 : cannot resolve symlink /var/lib/nova/instances/instance-0000000e/disk.local: No such file or directory
2012-12-13 06:57:33.553+0000: 1318: error : qemuRemoveCgroup:562 : internal error Unable to find cgroup for instance-0000000e
2012-12-13 06:57:33.553+0000: 1318: warning : qemuProcessStop:3505 : Failed to remove cgroup for instance-0000000e
2012-12-13 07:00:13.084+0000: 1315: error : qemuMonitorIO:603 : internal error End of file from monitor
2012-12-13 07:00:13.086+0000: 1315: error : virNetDevGetIndex:656 : Unable to get index for interface vnet0: No such device
2012-12-13 07:01:36.603+0000: 1289: info : libvirt version: 0.9.8
2012-12-13 07:01:36.603+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 07:23:13.411+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 07:23:15.410+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 07:23:17.119+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 07:23:19.179+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error
2012-12-13 07:23:21.352+0000: 1289: error : virNetSocketReadWire:996 : End of file while reading data: Input/output error


i have installed all in single server. (ESSEX)

So kindly help me to rectify this error i am new to openstack.

Thanks in Advance.
title: I couldn't launch any instance and cannot even delet the instance

comments.content:
Hi,

i have been yesterday trying to launch an windows 2008,windows 2003 instance first the instance have been launched and i assigned the ip for the instance, but i couldn't take the instance Remote so i restarted all the services in nova. 

After that i can take the instance remote but not 2008 so i deleted the instance but i couldn't it showed the instance terminated but the task was in active state and status is deleting it haven't deleted yet till now.  i couldn't even launch any instance.

the nova-compute is in xxx state. others are in this state ( :-) ) i have restarted the service the nova-compute alone is showing un Known instance.

i checked the nova-compute.log file 

error details :

2012-12-13 12:53:20 DEBUG nova.utils [req-d855656f-e036-473f-8bf4-b01e8691da34 None None] Running cmd (subprocess): sudo nova-rootwrap route -n from (pid=3424) execute /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:219

2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     block_device_info)

2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova     return f(*args, **kw)
2012-12-13 12:53:21 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py", line 852, in resume_state_on_host_boot
